org.apache.distributedlog.logsegment

Interface LogSegmentEntryReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncCloseable

    @Beta
public interface LogSegmentEntryReader
extends AsyncCloseable
    An interface class to read the enveloped entry (serialized bytes of Entry) from a log segment

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  LogSegmentEntryReader.StateChangeListener 

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.distributedlog.io.AsyncCloseable

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Start the reader. The method to signal the implementation to start preparing the data for consumption readNext(int)

      • registerListener

        LogSegmentEntryReader registerListener(LogSegmentEntryReader.StateChangeListener listener)
        Register the state change listener
        Parameters:
        listener - register the state change listener
        Returns:
        entry reader

      • unregisterListener

        LogSegmentEntryReader unregisterListener(LogSegmentEntryReader.StateChangeListener listener)
        Unregister the state change listener
        Parameters:
        listener - register the state change listener
        Returns:
        entry reader

      • getSegment

        LogSegmentMetadata getSegment()
        Return the log segment metadata for this reader.
        Returns:
        the log segment metadata

      • onLogSegmentMetadataUpdated

        void onLogSegmentMetadataUpdated(LogSegmentMetadata segment)
        Update the log segment each time when the metadata has changed.
        Parameters:
        segment - new metadata of the log segment.

      • readNext

        CompletableFuture<List<Entry.Reader>> readNext(int numEntries)
        Read next numEntries entries from current log segment.

        numEntries will be best-effort.

        Parameters:
        numEntries - num entries to read from current log segment
        Returns:
        A promise that when satisified will contain a non-empty list of entries with their content.
        Throws:
        {@link - org.apache.distributedlog.exceptions.EndOfLogSegmentException} when read entries beyond the end of a closed log segment.

      • getLastAddConfirmed

        long getLastAddConfirmed()
        Return the last add confirmed entry id (LAC).
        Returns:
        the last add confirmed entry id.

      • isBeyondLastAddConfirmed

        boolean isBeyondLastAddConfirmed()
        Is the reader reading beyond last add confirmed.
        Returns:
        true if the reader is reading beyond last add confirmed

      • hasCaughtUpOnInprogress

        boolean hasCaughtUpOnInprogress()
        Has the log segment reader caught up with the inprogress log segment.
        Returns:
        true only if the log segment is inprogress and it is caught up, otherwise return false.
